entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inuvik Airport 03:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
